channel.title: Simple book
channel.description:
Okay so I am a new modeller and so i decided to make a book for the hell of it. so here is my simple book.
[URL=http://s1142.photobucket.com/albums/n612/SolidusTextures/?action=view&current=Book.jpg][IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n612/SolidusTextures/th_Book.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s1142.photobucket.com/albums/n612/SolidusTextures/?action=view&current=Spine.jpg][IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n612/SolidusTextures/th_Spine.jpg[/img][/URL]
Any tips/suggestions for me?

item.title: Simple book
item.dc:creator: @ripzone Triton
item.description:
@ripzone wrote:

Detail is fine, just needs a little more texture work. Keep up improving.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple book
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

This is the RESOURCES section, to show off models, go to moparscape and enter the model section.

Other from that, that book is too flat and the textures suck. No offense, but you need to get better textures and add more shape to the book (polygon wise).

Read full topic
